name: Metropolis Crimes
description: Red Johnson is a ginger-haired, laid-back private detective living in a corrupt city called Metropolis, where crime reigns supreme and police would rather blame an innocent bystander than actually investigate a case. If that sounds familiar, you've probably heard of Red Johnson's Chronicles or its sequel, One Against All. The largely unknown Metropolis Crimes actually came before both, but was distributed only in limited markets worldwide.
